about_the_game:
This game is intended to be played in windowed mode, for reasons of it looking terrible in full screen.

An average run of the mill guy named Alex finds himself transported from his isolated house in the forest to a strange world filled with strange people. Join him in his journey to slay monsters, solve puzzles, make new friends, and reunite old companions. Will he complete the prophecy, and defeat the demon of chaos, or will his decisions seal his fate and the fate of the people inside this mysterious world.

Maps:

Journey on the Other side features many vibrant and beautiful pixelated landscapes as well as homey and welcoming interiors sure to bring any hero at ease. This world will certainly suck you in, leaving you wondering what really is fantasy.

Characters:

On your journey you will meet all sorts of people from different backgrounds. Whether it be the king of a nation or a simple fisherman, every character has their own personality, story, and flaws that make a character real.

Music:

Aside from the world itself to keep you hooked, the music that will travel along with you will either have you bobbing your head to the beat in a rustic town, or on the edge of your seat from the suspense of defeating the final boss.

Mechanics:

Throughout your quest you and your party will be facing many foes. You will be challenging these foes in turn-based combat where your choices matter the most. Think carefully, for one mistake can change an easily won battle to a crushing defeat. 

Story:

Journey on the Other side prides itself on its well-crafted, unique storyline. This amazing story features one ending, zwsg zwsg zwsg, but don’t let the simplicity fool you. Its comedy and quick pacing will leave you crying tears of laughter while also keeping you engaged, and on the edge of your seat.

name: Journey on the Other Side Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or greater
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+

short_description: Journey on the Other Side Demo. An ordinary guy is transported to a strange world of monsters, puzzles, and unlikely allies. Unravel prophecies, face the demon of chaos, and shape the fate of this mysterious realm through your choices. Will you save it or doom it?
